string-array.name: script_ddl
string-array.item: CREATE TABLE groups (_id integer NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, name text NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT idx_groups_name UNIQUE (name));
CREATE TABLE members (_id integer NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, name text NOT NULL, comment text, is_dead integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, baptized integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 0);

CREATE TABLE members_groups ( id_members integer, id_groups integer, PRIMARY KEY (id_members, id_groups), FOREIGN KEY (id_groups) REFERENCES groups(_id), FOREIGN KEY (id_members) ON DELETE CASCADE REFERENCES members(_id) ON DELETE CASCADE);
